translations.translation: Who will make me die, then give me life again,
Who will cause me to die and then will again restore me to life;
He will cause me to die and will bring me back to life.
“And He will give me death, then resurrect me.”
And Who will cause me to die, and then will bring me to life.
And He Who will cause me to die, then give me life;
who makes me to die, then gives me life,
And Who causeth me to die, then giveth me life (again),
He who will cause me to die and bring me back to life;
And He Who shall cause me to die, and then shall quicken me.
who will make me die, then He will bring me to life,
Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);
And Who will cause me to die, and then will bring me to life (again);
who makes me to die and then revives me,
He who makes me die, and then revives me.
And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life
[26:81] and Who will make me die, then give me life,
(And Who causeth me to die) in this worldly life, (then giveth me life (again)) on the Day of Judgement,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱلَّذِي يُمِيتُنِي } حين حلول أجلي، وانقضاء مدة حياتي في النشأة الأولى { ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ } [الشعراء: 81] في النشأة الأخرى؛ للعرض والجزاء
